title: Looking for Serious Players! Plat 4 +
body:
Hey, making a post on creating a professional and serious team. That will most likely compete in the open ladder and cyber-gamer.
It has come to my interest that creating a team by my standards will make this successful and a truly archiving experience, i require the best ability of you and our team to maybe one day become #1.
I'm currently looking for all roles. Just to get this started, once i get a fair bit of people i will start a trial games for a few days period until i pick the right team/people.
Also please ages 17+ Serious people only don't want to waste my time.
Just ADD ME IN-GAME for more info or leave a comment here, and i'll get back to you asap.

The name of the team isn't decided yet but once we will get the team name, an name change will be required for our team TAG.

12/20 People Selected Get in now !

Teamspeak will be used, that is also a requirement.
Thank you
-Andie
